data.title: Gods of Mars (Novel)
data.text:
Publications Portal Gods of Mars Author Graham McNeill Publisher Black Library Series Forge of Mars Preceded by Lords of Mars Released November 2014 Pages 320 Editions 2014 hardcover:

ISBN 9781849707237

Gods of Mars is the third and final novel in the series featuring an Adeptus Mechanicus Explorator fleet, by Graham McNeill. It is scheduled for publication in November 2014.

Cover Description

On the far fringes of the galaxy, Adeptus Mechanicus Magos Kotov's great journey is over. He has achieved his goal â€“ to find the resting place of the long-lost Magos Telok. But Telok isn't dead... As the brave explorers of Kotov's fleet marvel at the wonders Telok has to show them, darker plans unfold. As reality itself is threatened by impossible technologies, it may fall to a small group of Imperial soldiers and their eldar allies to thwart an insane plan and save not just the fleet, but the entire universe, from destruction.
